item.title: AI and the End of Accents
item.description: I sound Korean—because I am Korean. Can AI make me sound American?

item.title: AI’s Next Frontier? An Algorithm for Consciousness
item.description: Some of the world’s most interesting thinkers about thinking think they might’ve cracked machine sentience. And I think they might be onto something.

item.title: Rise of the Killer Chatbots
item.description: On an airstrip somewhere in Texas, a swarm of killer jets approaches—controlled by, of all things, a large language model.

item.title: Divorced? With Kids? And an Impossible Ex? There’s AI for That
item.description: They didn’t want to put their children in the middle—so they put a machine there instead.

item.title: AI Is Not God
item.description: In recent times, there have been two techno-religious awakenings. Here comes the third?
